Models¶

class main.models.Category(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Categories of Goods. Categories are logical containers that store goods with similar properties

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Good(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Goods. Good is a main entity. Goods are sellable items.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Manufacturer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Manufacturer. Manufacturer is a entity that manufactured a particular good

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes user profile. Extends standard user profile with additional fields

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
create_user_profile(instance, created, **kwargs)¶

Function that create user extended user profile and connect it to every new user.

class main.models.SMSlog(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describer sms codes and their status We can have many codes on one user if he didn’t response on first one and request another.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Seller(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Seller. Seller is an entity that can be distributor of a good

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Subscriber(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Subscriber. Subscriber is a person who want to receive mails from Store

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class main.models.Tag(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that describes Tags. Tag is an identifier for categorizing, describing, searching for data, and setting the internal structure

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
main.models.birth_date(value)¶

Functions that validate birth_date of User

main.models.notify_on_good_create(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)¶

Function that send a new mail to Subscriber list when a new good created in the store.
